title: The Glorification of Andrea Doria
text: This is a modello, or prepatory work, for a large ceiling painting that used to be in the Palazzo Doria in Rome. It shows Andrea Doria (1466-1560), an important Genoese political and military figure, with the classical hero Pompey the Great and the city of Genoa, personified as the kneeling female figure. Andrea V Doria (1707-65), a descendant, commissioned this work in the late 18th century.
description: Modello - Apotheosis of Individual Persons : Andrea Doria
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
